upgrades.name: Dread Flight
upgrades.description: Your Special can strike up to 4 additional foes before returning.
upgrades.notes:
• Incompatible with Aspect of Zeus
  • Does not work with Chaos Aspect's multi-shield special (still works with normal special)

upgrades.name: Pulverizing Blow
upgrades.description: Your Attack hits twice, but does not knock foes away.
upgrades.notes: • Only affects Bash. Dash-Strike & Bull Rush are not affected.

upgrades.name: Dashing Wallop
upgrades.description: Your Dash Attack deals +50% damage in a larger area.

upgrades.name: Explosive Return
upgrades.description: Your Special deals 50 damage to nearby foes when you catch it.

upgrades.name: Minotaur Rush
upgrades.description: Your Bull Rush gains a Power Rush that does +500% damage.

upgrades.name: Breaching Rush
upgrades.description: Your Bull Rush deals +400% damage to Armor.

upgrades.name: Charged Shot
upgrades.description: Your Bull Rush instead fires a piercing shot that deals 80 base damage.

upgrades.name: Charged Flight
upgrades.description: Hold Special to charge your throw for up to +200% base damage.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Dashing Flight
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Chaos and Aspect of Zeus.

upgrades.name: Empowering Flight
upgrades.description: After your Special hits, your next 2 Attacks deal +80% damage.

upgrades.name: Dashing Flight
upgrades.description: While you Dash, your Special is faster and deals +200% damage.
upgrades.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Charged Flight
  • Incompatible with Aspect of Zeus

upgrades.name: Ferocious Guard
upgrades.description: After blocking a foe, gain +20% damage and move speed for 10 Sec.

upgrades.name: Unyielding Defense
upgrades.description: After using your Naegling's Board Cast, you are Sturdy for 3 Sec.
